```{r metrics-bw-udp-plot}
udp_bw_plot <- ggplot(filterBW(UDP_BW, "bitrate", "SENDER"), aes(x = endTime, y = X_value, group = sourceHost)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_grid(vars(sourceHost), vars(destinationHost))
```
